DisableLoginItemsSuppression.title: Disable shift to suppress login items
DisableLoginItemsSuppression.description: Prevent users from disabling login items launching using the Shift key.

AuthenticateAsLoginUserShortName.title: Authenticate with short name.
AuthenticateAsLoginUserShortName.description: Authenticate to the URL with the current users short name. Required if URL is specified, but not for Path

AutoLaunchedApplicationDictionary-manage.title: Launch network home share point at login
AutoLaunchedApplicationDictionary-manage.description: Automatically launch the users network home share point when logging in.
